column4: is it advisable to give ubuntu 12.04 to a linux-newbie as soon as it is released? or better play it save, install 11.10 and have some progs to be at a lower version?
i thought i might wait a month or two and then just update the 11.10
jrib mathews ActionPa1snip , thank you all... think i'll install 11.10 and upgrade to 12.04 after some weeks
